content: Maybe the thing I'm most proud is the blogroll can host Jay Graber, CEO of Bluesky, because they support outbound RSS. I can also follow Eugen Rochko, founder of Mastodon, for the same reason. And of course Matt Mullenweg, founder of Automattic, whose WordPress supported RSS from inception. Bluesky, Mastodon and WordPress, in the same social web. One of those Golden Spike moments.
